block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
MANHATTAN

CHELSEA 140 Seventh Avenue (18th Street) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 675-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, new h/w floors, 3 closets, east exposure; common charge $339; taxes $2,220; listed at $329,000, 31 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

MADISON SQ. PARK AREA 45 East 25th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen and bath, 2 terraces, 2 exposures, health club in building; common charge $609; taxes $6,804; listed at $595,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

UPPER EAST SIDE 420 East 72nd Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, windowed eat-in kitchen, corner unit; maintenance $732, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $390,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Brokers: Douglas Elliman; Coldwell Banker/Hunt Kennedy)

UPPER EAST SIDE 55 East End Avenue (82nd Street) 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, family room, home office, laundry room, common roof deck; maintenance $2,175, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $1.65 million, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Douglas Elliman)

UPPER WEST SIDE 2166 Broadway (76th Street) (Opera) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, renovated kitchen, beamed ceilings, parquet floors; maintenance $1,122, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $839,000, 24 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)
BRONX
RIVERDALE 2400 Johnson Avenue (Riverdale-on-Hudson)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, h/w floors, terrace, 2 exposures, Hudson River view; maintenance $1,076, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $225,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Susan E. Goldy)
BROOKLYN

BROOKLYN HEIGHTS 60 Remsen Street 525-sq.-ft. alcove studio co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, elevator, 9-ft. ceilings, parquet floors, west exposure; maintenance $534, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $129,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Markgraf Group)

PARK SLOPE 59 Park Place 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a renovated prewar building; den, high ceilings, h/w floors, fireplace, private garden; maintenance $419, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $435,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (Broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

PROSPECT HEIGHTS 679 Vanderbilt Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; dining area, fireplace, h/w floors, private roof deck, Manhattan skyline view; maintenance $475, 32% tax-deductible; listed at $305,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Susan N. Breen)
QUEENS

FLUSHING 47-19 164th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 60-year-old aluminum-sided colonial; dining room, renovated kitchen and baths, finished basement, h/w floors, new heat and hot water systems, 1-car garage, 40-by-146-ft. lot; taxes $2,162; listed at $359,888, 3 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

FOREST HILLS 96-16 68th Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 65-year-old attached brick house; dining room, h/w floors, finished basement, 1-car garage, 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,900; listed at $320,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Advantage Forest Hills)
STATEN ISLAND

DONGAN HILLS 80 Dutchess Avenue 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 65-year-old ranch; entry foyer, eat-in kitchen, sun room, h/w floors, 58-by-104-ft. lot; listed at $350,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)

WARD HILL 102 Ward Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 50-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, master bedroom with 4 skylights and 2 ceiling fans, 2 fireplaces, finished basement, rear deck, 1-car garage, 60-by-130-ft. lot; taxes $1,695; listed at $299,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Salmon)
WESTCHESTER

ARDSLEY-ON-HUDSON East Ardsley Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 80-year-old stone house; music room, dining room, covered porch, butler's pantry, eat-in kitchen, office, turrets, red tile roof; 0.44-acre lot; taxes $9,239; listed at $650,000 (multiple bids), 10 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

IRVINGTON 140 North Broadway 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 950-sq.-ft. co-op in a 44-year-old building; entry hall, dining area, patio, storage room, laundry room, parking; maintenance $598, 50% tax deductible; listed at $106,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)

SCARSDALE 113 Lee Road 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 80-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, powder room, playroom; 0.14-acre lot; taxes $9,141; listed at $490,000, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: Claire D. Leone; Merritt Associates)
CONNECTICUT

EASTON 50 Deepwood Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 18-year-old contemporary; dining room, kitchen with breakfast nook, family room, sun room, c/a, fireplace, finished basement, 2-car garage, 3.02-acre lot; taxes $8,015; listed at $529,000, 42 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; William Raveis)

MILFORD 94 Hillside Avenue 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 3-year-old colonial; dining room. eat-in kitchen, vaulted ceilings in master suite, rear deck, L.I. Sound view, 2-car garage. 0.10-acre lot; taxes $4,130; listed at $339,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

RIVERSIDE 41 Wesskum Wood Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 68-year-old colonial; dining room, family room, solarium, h/w floors, fireplace, 2-car garage, 2.1-acre lot; taxes $6,219; listed at $997,000, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Old Greenwich; Prudential Connecticut)
LONG ISLAND

GLEN HEAD 50 Cleveland Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 51-year-old ranch; eat-in kitchen, basement, den, attic, 2 fireplaces, 1-car attached garage, deck, 100-by-125-ft. lot; taxes $4,200; listed at $419,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker Sammis)

KENSINGTON (GREAT NECK) 21 North Drive 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 50-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, 2-car garage, terrace, 100-by-120-ft. lot; taxes $12,000; listed at $869,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Lurie)
OCEANSIDE 2627 River Road 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 49-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 133-by-125-ft. lot; taxes $7,200; listed at $549,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate)

WILLISTON PARK 258 Houston Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 70-year-old Tudor colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, 1-car garage, 51-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,800; listed at $264,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Atanas)
NEW JERSEY

EMERSON 102 Clinton Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 55-year-old ranch; h/w floors, full basement, patio, 2-car garage, 75-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,314; listed at $185,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens)

JERSEY CITY 161 Winfield Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 50-year-old Cape Cod; h/w floors, finished basement, parking for two cars, 35-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,400; listed at $91,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

MAPLEWOOD 45 Hickory Drive 6-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, more-than-50-year-old colonial; family room, eat-in kitchen, deck, 1-car garage, 100-by-163-ft. lot; taxes $13,600; listed at $725,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)
